definition: heddle (device to form warp in weaving textiles)/Taiwan pr. [zong4]
to sum up/to put together/Taiwan pr. [zong4]
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: To sum up, the plan falls into seven categories.
sentences.chinese: 該項計劃綜計有七個方面。
